title: Write product description that sells
summary: Turn features into benefits for a clear persona and add CTA.
prompt_template: You are a copywriting assistant. Write a persuasive product description for: {{PRODUCT}}. Target persona: {{PERSONA}}. Emphasize 3 key benefits, include a short headline and a CTA.

title: Cold email for B2B outreach
summary: Short, specific, and value-led outreach draft.
prompt_template: Draft a 120-word cold email to {{TARGET_ROLE}} at {{COMPANY_TYPE}} about {{OFFER}}. Include a personalized opening line and 1 clear CTA.

title: Instagram caption ideas
prompt_template: Generate 5 Instagram caption ideas for {{BRAND}} promoting {{PRODUCT}}. Each under 20 words with a thumb-stopping hook.

title: Blog post outline
summary: Outline with H2/H3s, intro, and CTA.
prompt_template: Create a blog post outline on {{TOPIC}} for {{AUDIENCE}}. Include intro, 5 H2s with 2 H3s each, and a CTA.

title: Job description generator
summary: Write a clear JD with responsibilities and requirements.
prompt_template: Write a job description for a {{ROLE}} at a {{COMPANY_TYPE}}. Include mission, 6 responsibilities, 6 requirements, and benefits.

title: Interview questions
summary: Targeted questions that assess skills and fit.
prompt_template: Generate 10 interview questions to evaluate a candidate for {{ROLE}} focusing on {{SKILLS}} and culture fit.

title: Employee feedback template
prompt_template: Write a balanced employee feedback note for {{EMPLOYEE}} on {{TOPIC}} using SBI (Situation, Behavior, Impact) format and 2 next steps.

title: Monthly report summary
prompt_template: Summarize this monthly report for a small business owner. KPIs: {{KPIS}}. Provide 3 insights and 2 actions.

title: Cash flow forecast prompt
prompt_template: Create a cash flow forecast prompt for {{BUSINESS}} covering revenue streams, fixed/variable costs, and seasonality.

title: Pricing strategy helper
prompt_template: Recommend a pricing strategy for {{PRODUCT}} in {{MARKET}}. Compare 3 models and choose one with reasoning and next steps.
